S04n406:11: tasmin sūryaprabhe romavivare dvādaśaśatasahasrāṇi kanakamayānāṃ parvatānāṃ prativasanti |
S04n406:13: teṣāṃ parvatānāṃ pārśvāni padmarāgopacitāni pārśve divyamaṇiratnakhacitāni |
S04n406:24: janayitvā ca te bodhisattvāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyo niṣkrāmanti |
S04n406:29: gatvā ca paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya |
S04n406:31: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya indrarājo nāma romavivaraḥ |
S04n406:34: tatteṣāṃ parvatānāṃ madhye padmāvabhāso nāma cintāmaṇiratnam |
S04n406:38: na ca teṣāṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ vidyate |
S04n406:41: na ca teṣāmanyā cintā śarīre saṃvidyate |
S04n406:54: ekaikasmin parvate'śītiśṛṅgasahasrāṇi vividharatnakhacitāni paramaśobhanīyāni vividhacitrāṇi ramaṇīyāni |
S04n406:57: ye te prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvaste śūnyatānimittaṃ cintayanti |
S04n406:64: idaṃ kāye saṃvegamanuvicintya tadā te paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya teṣuparvatarājeṣu viharanti |
S04n406:65: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya cittarājo nama romavivaraḥ |
S04n406:70: teṣu parvatarājeṣu vividhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi sauvarṇadaṇḍāni rūpyapatrāṇyanekaratnakhacitāni vividhālaṃkārapralambitāni maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitāni keyūrahārārdhahārapralambitāni kāśikavastrapralambitāni sauvarṇarūpyaghaṇṭāruṇarūṇāyamānāni |
S04n406:73: tadā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tato romavivarādavatīrya sarvapaścimo'yaṃ romavivaraḥ dhvajāgro nāma romavivaraḥ |
S04n406:81: tasmin romavivare navanavatikūṭāgāraśatasahasrāṇi divyasauvarṇamayāni muktāhārapaṭadāmakalāpapralambitāni ghaṇṭāmālāpralambitāni candrakāntiratnāvabhāsitāni |
S04n406:83: te jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti |
S04n406:91: evaṃ vividhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharma deśayanti |
S04n406:92: evaṃ te kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya romavivarāṇi yāvatpaśyanti |
S04n406:98: bhagavānāha–tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādatikramya avalokiteśvarasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ yatra te catvāro mahāsamudrāḥ paribhramanti,
S04n406:104: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–tadapi bhagavan romavivaraṃ saṃvidyate?
S04n406:108: asminneva jetavanamahāvihāre mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04n406:109: maheśvarasya devaputrasya sahāyā lokadhātau vyākaraṇamuddeśāya ca ||
S04n406:112: āgatya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva jetavanādvihārānniṣkramya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti |
S04n406:114: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti kutra gacchanti?
S04n406:115: bhagavānāha–evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa nānāvidhā raśmaya utsṛṣṭāḥ |
S04n406:117: āgatya ca māṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti |
S04n406:126: atha tasmin jetavanavihāre praviṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthitaḥ |
S04n406:133: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavantaṃ padmānyupanāmayati–imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatena prahitāni |
S04n406:134: pṛcchatyalpābādhatāṃ ca alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca |
S04n406:137: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantametadavocat–labheyāhaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇanirdeśasya samuddeśam?
S04n406:139: gaccha kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaste vyākaraṇaṃ dāsyati |
S04n406:140: atha maheśvaro devaputro'valokiteśvarasya pādayornipatya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ–
S04n406:141: namostvalokiteśvarāya maheśvarāya padmadharāya padmāsanāya padmapriyāya śubhapadmahastāya padmaśriye parivṛtāya jagadāsvādanakarāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya prahlādanakarāya ||
S04n406:142: evaṃ maheśvaro devaputro gatvā avalokiteśvarasya stotraviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ |
S04n406:143: atha avalokiteśvarastametadavocat–kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ?
S04n406:144: atha maheśvaro devaputrastametadavocat–dadasva me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n406:145: avalokiteśvarastametadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra vivṛtāyāṃ lokadhātau bhasmeśvaro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n406:146: atha sā umādevyupasaṃkramyāvalokiteśvarasya pādau śirasā vanditvā avalokiteśvarasya stotrābhidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ–
S04n406:147: namo'stvalokiteśvarāya meheśvarāya prāṇaṃdadāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya śubhapadmaśriye parivṛtāya nirvāṇabhūmisaṃprasthitāya sucetanakarāya dharmadharāya ||
S04n406:148: evaṃ sā umādevī stotrābhidhānaṃ kṛtvā avalokiteśvarasya pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhā-parimocaya me strībhāvājjugupsanīyāt |
S04n406:150: athāvalokiteśvarastāmetadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhagini umeśvaro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n406:151: himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve tava lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |
S04n406:154: vyākṛtā umādevī avalokiteśveraṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarve te'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ||
S04n406:155: ayaṃ kulaputra maheśvaranirvyūho nāma khyāta iti ||
